attributes.action: GiveFrontline workers (NHS,Pharmacy etc) a bonus for efforts in Covid19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
In the face of the Covid 19 Pandemic the frontline staff put their lives on hold and in danger of infection for the health and safety of the UK population. They should be rewarded by a cash bonus to go someway of repaying them.

They have gone over and above their duty to help the country and should never be viewed as a lower  job and respected and paid what they are worth.
attributes.background:
UK government: Give all Frontline workers ( NHS, Pharmacy a bonus for their efforts in Covid 19 Pandemic
In the face of the Covid 19 Pandemic the frontline staff put their lives on hold and in danger of infection H&S of the UK. They should be rewarded by a cash bonus to go someway of repaying them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
